ygData.subject: Re: [Digest Number 83]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Beholder Maze: I ve seen fighter types try these evil eyes.  Best to leave them to the casters, their charm is just too nasty. Orc Highway -- West side of
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: "Goode, Jason" <JGoode@...>
>
> 3.) Reconsider Mistmoore. Orc Highway - what are you talking about? Maze -
> Do you mean The Gorge of King Grobb? If so, it's a bit slow, but still
> okay. You really shouldn't have to contend with lawn trash in Unrest at
> that level. Also, consider Runnyeye, East Karana, South Karana, Rathe
> Mountains, Cazic Thule, Permafrost and Upper Guk.
>
Beholder Maze:
I've seen fighter types try these evil eyes. Best to leave them
to the casters, their charm is just too nasty.

Orc Highway -- West side of the Oasis, particularly just west of the
gypsy camp. Stand to the side of the "road" and watch the orcs just
walk back and forth. Somehow people get them mad and instead of
walking, they run back and forth...

Mistmoore is awesome. Leveled from 24 to 26 in about 8 hours here.
Upper Guk is always really nice. Hardly anyone ever killing guks
for experience, I'm not sure why, its great.

Unrest, Cazic are also both good, SK is way too camped for my liking.
